title: Paleo Mint Ice Cream
directions: Mix all in blender. ( omit chips until the end if you prefer)
I do scrape the sides now and then.
You can add little sprigs of mint--for fun!
Some people add some Paleo friendly dark chocolate pieces or chips. ( I do occasionally or more than occassionaly)
Eat when done and serve with raw my chocolate Paleo, Chocolate Sauce.
Option: make ice-cream sandwiches using Paleo homemade cookies and you may layer with another flavored ice-cream. Yum!
ingredients: 3-5 tablespoons melted but not hot honey, to taste (low carb or KETO diet use finely powdered Erythritol)
peppermint spirits to taste (I use about 12+ drops but I’m a mint addict and the minter the better)
optional: chocolate chips or pieces- Paleo approved is best and mint leaves for fun and more color.
